jd: From: Priti, Tek Inspirations LLC priti.dubey@tekinspirations.com Reply to: priti.dubey@tekinspirations.com Job Description -SUBMIT FROM TRUSTED 3RD PARTY WHO CAN PAY US REFERALLS ( we are looking for native cadidate )Familiarity with major EMR systems (e.g., Epic, Cerner) and experience in healthcare data security Lead Data Engineer Lead Data Engineer moi: skypevisa: USC AND GC ONLY ( PLEASE SUBMIT GENUIVE VISA CANDIDATE TO ROLE )Job Summary:The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in data engineering, data mesh, modern data stack, and data sharing, ensuring the seamless transition and integration of EMR systems.Key Responsibilities:Data Architecture: Design and implement scalable data architectures to support EMR migration, leveraging data mesh principles.Data Migration: Lead the migration of data from legacy EMR systems to new platforms, ensuring data integrity and security.Modern Data Stack: Utilize modern data stack technologies to build robust data pipelines and workflows.Data Sharing: Develop and maintain solutions for secure and efficient data sharing across systems and stakeholders.Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or a related field.Experience: Minimum of 7-10 years of experience in data engineering, with a focus on data migration and healthcare IT.Technical Skills:Data Mesh: Experience with data mesh architecture and principles.Modern Data Stack: Proficiency in technologies such as Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, dbt, Airflow, and Snowflake.Programming Languages: Strong skills in Python, SQL, and other relevant programming languages.Cloud Platforms: Experience with cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) for data storage and processing.Data Sharing: Knowledge of data sharing frameworks and protocols.Data Products: Experience in developing and managing data products.Preferred Qualifications:Certifications:AWS Certified Data Analytics - SpecialtyGoogle Professional Data EngineerMicrosoft Certified: Azure Data Engineer AssociateCertified Data Management Professional (CDMP)Knowledge: Familiarity with major EMR systems (e.g., Epic, Cerner) and experience in healthcare data securityRegards,Priti DubeySenior Technical Recruiter Desk: 469-639-0969| Email: priti.dubey@tekinspirations.com TEK Inspirations LLC | 13573 Tabasco Cat Trail, Frisco, TX 75035Disclaimer: This communication, along with any documents, files or attachments, is intended only for the use of the addressee and may contain confidential information.
